A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The disappointment is almost too much to bear. 40 years of watching the greatest Saga and hero of all times and it was all erased in 2 1/2 hours. Idk what the slap stick comedy was about. I think Mel Brooks did that version once upon a time. Luke deserved better. He deserved a better send off\, or better yet to be kept around to lead and train a new Jedi order. Rey deserved the knowledge and training from a Jedi master as Luke and Anakin received. All the other films have the same feel to them when you watch. This one feels like it's not even a Star Wars movie. Rey deserves a back story. She deserves better than to be told she's just an afterthought tossed away as a small child like a piece of garbage. What the heck happened in editing and post production? Wasn't anymore paying attention? My only wish since every beloved character is dead now\, is that I could unsee this film and go back to enjoying the previous 8 including Rogue One. People ask how I feel about the film. All I can say is stunned.
